name: Major (Dr.) Mohd Ali Shah
description: Maj (Dr.) Md Ali Shah (Veteran) is a distinguished defense and strategic expert, awarded the Eastern Army Commander's and Director General Assam Rifles Commendation Cards for his contributions to Northeast India. He led the Assam Rifles contingent at the 2008 Republic Day Parade and is a former detective and 'Mr. Pune Talent 1999.' An IIM graduate as well, he is a visiting faculty at Whistling Woods International and has trained under legends like Naseeruddin Shah and Om Puri. As an award-winning actor, he has appeared in acclaimed films such as Haider, Bajrangi Bhaijaan, and Tashkent Files.

name: Mr. Dinesh Mohan
description: At 63, Dinesh Mohan has redefined success in modeling and acting, starting his career at 57 in 2016. He has appeared in top fashion campaigns for Vogue, GQ, and leading designers, walking as a showstopper at major fashion weeks, including Amazon India Fashion Week and Kerala Fashion League.Recognized with the Pride of Nation Award and Gem of India Award for his inspiring journey, Dinesh has been featured in Hindustan Times, Times of India, and The Hindu. He has also judged top modeling contests and is a sought-after motivational speaker, delivering talks at TEDx, Josh Talks, and other platforms.

name: Mr. Vineet Malhotra
description: With over two decades in mainstream media, Vineet Malhotra is a seasoned journalist and prime-time debate host. He began his career in sports broadcasting, covering major global events like the IPL (Season 1), Commonwealth Games, Olympics, and the ICC World Cups (2011, 2015, 2019). Vineet has held key editorial roles as Executive Editor at Times Now, Zee News, and TIRANGA TV, while also serving as a prime-time host for Times Now, NDTV, Zee News, and NewsX. His expertise extends beyond journalism to marketing and public awareness, having anchored major national events, including Lok Sabha elections and historic sporting spectacles.

name: Mr. Navin Gulia
description: Was declared permanently disabled after an army accident at the age of 22. Since then, he has been an advocate for disabled rights and has also appeared on the popular TV show, ‘Kaun Banega Crorepati’. He also made it to the Limca Book of Records by becoming the first & only person to drive from Delhi to Marsimik La, the highest motorable pass in the world, driving nonstop for 55 hours in 2004. Was awarded the prestigious ‘National Role Model Award’ from Dr Abdul Kalam in 2007,  the ‘Global Indian Award’ by Times Of India in 2005, ‘Karamveer Puruskar’ from iCongo in 2011 & ‘CNN-IBN Real Heroes Award’ in 2012.

name: Ms. Nikita Chawla
description: Nikita Chawla, a recipient of the Hindustan Times 30 Under 30 Achievers Award, is a dynamic individual excelling across various fields. From publishing her first book at 16 to becoming India's youngest national TV political analyst at 26, she has redefined multipotentiality. A travel writer, food critic, motivational speaker, and anchor, she has collaborated with global tourism boards and inspired at top institutions. Nikita has also modeled for luxury brands and anchored major events, breaking body stereotypes and proving that one can pursue multiple passions with success.

name: Ms. Gauri Varma
description: Chef Gauri Verma, the founder of Confect, is a passionate entrepreneur and leader driven by a love for baking and a desire to empower women. Despite facing personal challenges, Gauri's resilience led her to pursue a crash course in food technology. She relentlessly tested recipes and sought feedback from fellow bakers, refining her products through over 400 trials. Her dedication culminated in a breakthrough recipe that could withstand India's diverse climates, marking the beginning of her inspiring journey to success.

name: Mr. Hemant Sachdev
description: Hemant Sachdev, a passionate mountaineer and Everester, has named his company Chogori India Retail Limited (CIRL) after "Chogori", the local name for K2, the world’s second-highest mountain. CIRL is the exclusive distributor of several premium international outdoor brands in India, specializing in high-performance sportswear and outdoor gear. The company currently represents renowned brands such as Columbia Sportswear, Deuter, Lowa, Buff, Black Diamond, Mountain Hardwear, Julbo, and Adventuras.

name: Mr. Amit Malik
role: President of Wadzpay Japan Asia Pacific & Australia
description: Amit Malik is a dynamic executive with 25+ years of experience in leading businesses through transitions, fostering innovation, and building agile organizations. One of the few HR leaders to become a CEO, he is currently President, Japan Asia Pacific & Australia at Wadzpay Worldwide Ltd. Previously, he was CEO & MD of Aviva India. A thought leader, speaker, and author, he advocates financial literacy and inclusion. Awarded for leadership, he enjoys reading 50+ books yearly, sports, and movies. His mantra: “Leadership is a choice, not a position.”

name: Dr. Saarthak Bakshi
role: CEO of RISAA IVF and Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia honoree
description: Dr. Saarthak Bakshi is a healthcare leader and startup mentor. He manages Neos Angels, investing in 30+ startups, and champions the “fail fast and rise early” mindset. Known for transforming the fertility sector, his initiatives like IIRFT and Women Hopes support couples battling infertility, driving awareness and impactful change.
